description: An intersection of two B\u00e9zier surfaces.

surface1.description: ID of the first surface in the intersection.

surface2.description: ID of the second surface in the intersection.

intersections.description: List of info describing curved polygon(s) in the intersection.

items.description: Either a curved polygon that occurs within the surface-surface intersection or a boolean. If a boolean, `true` indicates that the intersection is the first surface (i.e. it's fully contained in the second) and `false` indicates that the intersection is the second surface.
